scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development module=app npx concurrently --kill-others "node tools/server.js" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "ROLLUP,SERVER"
scripts.start:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=development module=h5 h5=true npx concurrently --kill-others "node tools/server.js" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "ROLLUP,SERVER"
scripts.build:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development module=app npx rollup -c tools/rollup.config.js -w
scripts.build:watch:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=development module=h5 npx rollup -c tools/rollup.config.js -w
